text: Adam Kotzmann (born 8 April 1993) is a Czech alpine skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Alpine skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Czech male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the Czech Republic Category:Competitors at the 2017 Winter Universiade
title: Adam Kotzmann
